text:
Rollin Augustus "Rod" Daniel III (August 4, 1942 – April 16, 2016) was an American television and movie director. He directed the movies "Teen Wolf" (1985), "Like Father Like Son" (1987), "K-9" (1989), "The Super" (1991), "Beethoven's 2nd" (1993) and ' (2002).
Daniel died at his home in Chicago, Illinois on April 16, 2016 from Parkinson's disease, aged 73.
